universal_guidelines: NEVER use generic full-screen gradients. Use subtle radial glows or noise textures.
Dark mode is NOT just black. Use Slate-900 (#0F172A) as the deepest shade to maintain warmth and reduce eye strain.
Data Density: In the dashboard, avoid massive whitespace. This is a tool for professionals. Use 'Mode B' Bento Grid.
Map Interaction: The map is the hero. Controls should float over it (Glassmorphism), not push it aside.
Accessibility: Ensure text contrast on dark backgrounds meets APCA standards. Blue text on dark grey is often hard to read; use Sky-400 or Sky-300 instead of standard Blue-500.

instructions_to_main_agent.step_1: Install dependencies: `npm install framer-motion recharts leaflet react-leaflet lucide-react sonner clsx tailwind-merge`
instructions_to_main_agent.step_2: Configure Tailwind with the 'Midnight Clinical' palette defined in colors section.
instructions_to_main_agent.step_3: Create the 'GlassCard' and 'BentoGrid' reusable components first.
instructions_to_main_agent.step_4: Implement the Map View using Leaflet with a dark tile layer (e.g., CartoDB Dark Matter).
instructions_to_main_agent.step_5: Build the RAG Chat interface as a floating drawer or dedicated sidebar with a 'Tactical Terminal' aesthetic.
